original_text: And whoever sits on anything on which the one with the discharge has sat shall wash his clothes and bathe himself in water and be unclean until the evening.
korean_text: 유출병이 있는 자가 앉았던 자리에 앉는 자는 그의 옷을 빨고 물로 씻을 것이요 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: on which the one with the discharge has sat
sentences.korean_translation: 유출증이 있는 사람이 앉았던 것 위에

sentences.original_text: and be unclean until the evening.
